attributes.action: Bring back the Leeds German Market tent, with Live Music
attributes.background: The German Market in Leeds at Xmas time is a magical place. Without a doubt the highlight is the Tent which contains live music and much merriment. It has been "decided" to get rid of this tent from next Xmas, which is an absolute disaster for the city. Bring it back for Xmas 2016!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Leeds German Market is the responsibility of Leeds City Council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
